A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so excited and so let down by the movie. They seemed to have forgotten what made the movies great which is the characters and the story. What a let down and I'm bummed I spent so much to watch a repeat of the Phantom Menace again!!!!! How do you make Rogue One which had great characters and a tight story to Luke milking a jelly creature??\nCinematic Swill!!!!!
